Title: The Four Poster
Writer: Jan de Hartog (play), Jan de Hartog (screenplay), Allan Scott (screenplay)
Plot: Adapted from the prize-winning Broadway play that featured two people and a four-poster bed, in which the couple enacts their marriage, from its day in 1897, until he dies, some time after she has died from cancer. It is a "love" that endured wars, an "other" woman, and the death of their favorite son. The episodes are bridged and linked by cartoon sequences done by UPA (United Productions of America.)
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.
